experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: - Built the complete event timeline feature for their inhouse employee upskilling platform- Created the multipage frontend using React Js, Redux, SCSS and other inhouse frameworks - Implemented the backend Controller, Service and DAO setup using Java, SpringBoot, MyBatis and SQL    Server- Followed strategy and template design patterns to create modular code and easy future extensibility- Defined user roles and added authentication based on access priviledges in both the Redux and Java   layer
experience.description_html: - Built the complete event timeline feature for their inhouse employee upskilling platform- Created the multipage frontend using React Js, Redux, SCSS and other inhouse frameworks - Implemented the backend Controller, Service and DAO setup using Java, SpringBoot, MyBatis and SQL  Server- Followed strategy and template design patterns to create modular code and easy future extensibility- Defined user roles and added authentication based on access priviledges in both the Redux and Java  layer

experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
experience.description: - Implemented the feature to allow the tutor to report a problem on the lessons they teach to the   students- Built the complete frontend web interface using React Js and used Relay Js to fetch data from the    backend- Created the GraphQL layer to respond to frontend queries and implemented fetch/update queries on   the PostgreSQL database- Collaborated with the design team and product management team to perform end-to-end testing of the    product use cases
experience.description_html: - Implemented the feature to allow the tutor to report a problem on the lessons they teach to the  students- Built the complete frontend web interface using React Js and used Relay Js to fetch data from the  backend- Created the GraphQL layer to respond to frontend queries and implemented fetch/update queries on  the PostgreSQL database- Collaborated with the design team and product management team to perform end-to-end testing of the  product use cases <!---->
